price: Ese ni ibisekuru bingahe tworetse mbere yabo, bigatakamba by’impitagihe?
arabic: كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ فَنَادَواْ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin fanādaw walāta ḥīna manāṣin
